question.example: I have a Model 3 reservation, how do I configure my order?

answer.example: To configure your order, sign in to your Tesla Account and select manage on your existing reservation to configure your Tesla vehicle. Your original USD deposit has now been converted to SGD. Note:- Reservations are not transferrable and can only be redeemed in the name of the reservation holder.

textCommand.example: Can you tell me Tesla model 3 specifications?

200.description: Response received from the bot successful.

items.example: The Tesla model 3 is an electric sedan known for its impressive performance and range. With sleek design and advanced technology, it offers acceleration from 0 to 60 mph in under 5 seconds and a range of up to 353 miles per charge. It features autopilot capabilities for enhanced safety.
